name: Fake Call Santa Joke
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Santa Call.
Fake Call Santa Joke - a joke app is a game where you interact with Santa Claus! Raffle friends, including fake call Santa Claus and show a friend, he will be very surprised!
Share close, let people think that Santa Claus is calling you! Turn on Christmas or New Year, create a holiday atmosphere!
In the game you can choose different Sant to call! You will hear the voice of Santa directly from your phone!
ATTENTION! This is not a real but only an imitation of the call! The app does not bear the harm and is only for fun and draw!
Thank you for playing with us leave us your feedback! And we try to make our game even more interesting!
